tasks.title: Create Compose Email Screen
tasks.description: Create a new email composition screen with recipient field, subject line, message body, and send button. Include attachment options and formatting tools.

tasks.title: Create Email Detail Screen
tasks.description: Implement a detailed email view screen showing the full email content, with reply, forward, and archive actions. Include proper formatting for email chains.

tasks.title: Create Settings Screen
tasks.description: Build a settings screen with options for notification preferences, display options, and account management using mock data.
